subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Gilberto Simoni is an inspiration to all retirees. He is back on his bicycle in the Giro d'Italia for the 14th time during his 16-year career as a professional.
snippet: Gilberto Simoni is an inspiration to all retirees. He is back on his bicycle in the Giro d'Italia for the 14th time during his 16-year career as a professional.
